author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Selena Gomez Announces 'Revival' World Tour
text:
Comments To promote her new album, the former Disney darling is visiting cities across the U.S. and Canada from May to July next year before going overseas. 
Selena Gomez is bringing her new album " Revival " on the road. The 23-year-old songbird casually announces in a video she's just posted on Instagram that she's going on a world tour next year in support of the record. In the clip taken in her hotel room, Gomez says in front of the camera, "I am launching my 'Revival' world tour. I will be going through the U.S. and Canada from May to July and then later in the year going overseas." She captioned the video with a link to a new website featuring a countdown that will end on Monday, October 5 with the revelation of the tour dates. A video posted by Selena Gomez (@selenagomez) on Oct 1, 2015 at 11:59am PDT "Revival", marking Gomez's first album since leaving the Disney-owned Hollywood Records, is due out on October 9 via Interscope. It has so far spawned singles "Good for You" and "Same Old Love". The former song featuring guest verse from A$AP Rocky has peaked at No. 5 on Billboard Hot 100.
